topic.title: Workspaces for Private Client (Retail)
topic.shortdesc: Workspace for Private Client is a desktop or a mobile UI starting page that is designed for Private Client role. The workspace is opened as Private Clients login to the internet banking application. Private Clients manage their banking operations within workspace.

body.p: This section contains examples of existing Internet banking application - ÄŒSOB. To make examples relevant, screenshots and videos should be taken from Starter Kit and/or Onboarding application (see Finshape's website).
